title: Puppy_Linux_JX_Slacko-5.7_archive_19-Mar-2014
description:
JX_Slacko 5.7

by Tman

Released 19-Mar-2014

more info http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?t=92693


Hi all, 

 This is JX_Slacko. In its current state, it is basically vanilla Slacko 5.7 with Xfce4panel. No apps from the original have been removed (yet). Please test it out and provide feedback and bug reports. I would consider this beta quality, as there are some minor issues with the Xfce panel that I still need to work out, but it is still very usable. 

 Thank You to 01micko and everyone else who had a hand in the creation of Slacko 5.7 

 The "JX" just stands for Jwm + Xfce4panel. This is a temporary name. I have a hard time trying to figure out names for my pups. Any suggestions for this one would be appreciated. 

 Download Link: jx_slacko5.7_v0.1.iso 
 size:156MB 
 md5sum: b44c9c8844983c1244d67ab393bb1e21 jx_slacko5.7_v0.1.iso
